q: reality TV's harshest judge. But in person, he's all about being zen. Just ask Idol expert Richard Rushfield, author of the new tell-all, American Idol: The Untold Story. We met at his huge office at Sony in London, which was two enormous rooms with lit candles, ginger tea and crutatae. He was very open. He wanted to know all the dirt I had heard about him. He did not respond defensively at all when I told him some of the unpleasant things that were in the book, Rushfield tells TVGuide.com.`` I think because he was so honest, there's a much more complete portrait of him in this book.'' alums say farewell to Simon Cowell As Idol prepares to
